name: Ext_R5_PlanDefinition_ac_documentation
title: Cross-version Extension for R5.PlanDefinition.action.documentation for use in FHIR R4
description: This cross-version extension represents PlanDefinition.action.documentation from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PlanDefinition|5.0.0 for use in FHIR R4.

element.short: Supporting documentation for the intended performer of the action
element.definition: Didactic or other informational resources associated with the action that can be provided to the CDS recipient. Information resources can include inline text commentary and links to web resources.
element.comment: `PlanDefinition.action.documentation` maps to R4 `PlanDefinition.action.documentation`. So is mapped as Equivalent.
